p: At each study site, we defined three forest outposts as sampling plots. In each plot, 64 trees equally distributed over the prevailing tree species and four classes of diameter at breast height (DBH; 5–10, >10–15, >15–20, >20 cm) were sampled with increment borers, employing a stratified sampling and resulting in a “pseudo‐population” design (Nehrbass‐Ahles et al., 2014).
